original_text: And when they came to Marah, they could not drink of the waters of Marah, for they were bitter: therefore the name of it was called Marah.
korean_text: 마라에 이르렀더니 그 곳 물이 써서 마시지 못하겠으므로 그 이름을 마라라 하였더라

sentences.original_text: And when they came to Marah
they could not drink of the waters of Marah
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 마라의 물을 마실 수 없었으니

sentences.original_text: therefore the name of it was called Marah
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그곳의 이름이 마라라 불리게 되었습니다
